name: Gravity Skate
description:
Skate around the world and avoid obstacles with gravity!
Tap the screen to jump, keep pressing to stay in the air !
Gravity Skate is an infinite runner: the goal is the avoid the obstacles, the fire hydrands on the ground and the flying saucers in the air.
Survive for as long as possible while avoiding obstacles and collecting gold coins to boost your score !
Get ready to gravitate around the earth ! Ready to be the best ?

Tu trouveras également en PJ les screens iPhone pour la page AppStore de Gravity Skate. Tu as juste à effectuer la même chose pour les screens iPad, je n’es pas la dernière version sans les boutons, donc je peux pas le faire.
